collection.name: source_polyCAT

variables.name: score
variables.description:
Score R list object with following elements:

  • score$theta
  • score$sem

variables.name: item_debug
variables.description: 1 to turn item debug mode on. 0 to turn it off. Item debug mode let's you specify which item you want to view from your item bank.

variables.name: poly_model
variables.description: The polytomous IRT model to use ("PCM", "GRM" or "GPCM")
